doc.field: New-York Historical Society collection of New York City miscellaneous manuscripts
New-York Historical Society collection of New York City miscellaneous manuscripts

3 Documents: Circular re Cholera epidemic has passed with signed note by Arthur Tappan to Merchants, Chamberlain & Caldwell of Cincinnati,; List of goods sold by James Montgomery; Letter of Joseph Moulton to Col. Ralph E. W. Earl regarding location of Customs House
